Uses of Interface
org.supercsv.encoder.CsvEncoder

  • Packages that use CsvEncoder 
    Package Description
    org.supercsv.encoder
    Provides the classes used for encoding CSV for writing.
    org.supercsv.prefs
    Provides the configuration classes used when instantiating readers and writers.

    • Uses of CsvEncoder in org.supercsv.encoder

      Classes in org.supercsv.encoder that implement CsvEncoder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultCsvEncoder
      The default CsvEncoder implementation.
      class  SelectiveCsvEncoder
      A selective CsvEncoder implementation - only the desired column numbers (if any) are encoded.

    • Uses of CsvEncoder in org.supercsv.prefs

      Methods in org.supercsv.prefs that return CsvEncoder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CsvEncoder CsvPreference.getEncoder()
      Returns the CSV encoder.
      Methods in org.supercsv.prefs with parameters of type CsvEncoder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CsvPreference.Builder CsvPreference.Builder.useEncoder(CsvEncoder encoder)
      Uses a custom CsvEncoder to escape CSV for writing.
